title: How to Type Emojis on PC

steps.title: Press ⊞ Win+. or ⊞ Win+;. This will open the character picker on Windows. Your keyboard might also have a character picker button; this button will usually have a smiley face or a square with a heart on top of it.
steps.content: Press ⊞ Win + . or ⊞ Win + ; . This will open the character picker on Windows. Your keyboard might also have a character picker button; this button will usually have a smiley face or a square with a heart on top of it.

steps.title: Choose the character picker button on a touch keyboard.
steps.content: Choose the character picker button on a touch keyboard. This icon has a square with a heart on top of it. This will open the emoji up for picking.

steps.title: Select the smiley face.
steps.content: Select the smiley face. This will allow you to pick an emoji.

steps.title: Choose an emoji.
steps.content: Choose an emoji. You can also quickly search for an emoji. Clicking on one will insert the emoji immediately.
